subject: Surgery and Surgeons
Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Penn State Coach Joe Paterno is expected to start walking Monday, and plans to return to coaching Dec. 1, when players return from a weeklong Thanksgiving break.
snippet: Penn State Coach Joe Paterno is expected to start walking Monday, and plans to return to coaching Dec. 1, when players return from a weeklong Thanksgiving break.
